dict.string: We create Parent-Child views. With the parent view displays the name of the files. Tapping on the file will show a detailed view which will in turn present a choice to open the file as well as all other choices for the file

Present a simple action control with choices. Action is based on the choices user pick. Actions will be presented only if the user taps on the details chevron in action view. Genral tap on the cell will result in opening the file
